My husband had visited the hospital and it was knee pain related issue.  ****** *** **** ** ********** *** I would like to recommend the doctor to many people. Tablets were prescribed by the doctor. I went to Dr.Rufus to check the radiant pain in the hip and calf region. Rufus is very friendly and approachable. He clearly examined and explained every medicine he prescribed and also the queries which I have. I would strongly recommend it to all.
